description: Apr 20, 2019   The following steps will show you how to prevent Google from tracking your mobile phone: Go to your mobile phones Settings. Choose Location. title: How to Tell If Your Phone Is Tapped - Lifewire
description: Apr 14, 2020   You can check for inaudible sounds on your phone by using a sound-bandwidth sensor on a low frequency. If it finds sounds several times in one minute, your phone may be tapped. If you have a landline phone: If your phone emits a dial tone when it is on the hook, this may also be a sign that it has been compromised.
